data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Jhenaidah.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jhenaidah, Khulna, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Jhenaidah. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Jhenaidah, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Jhenaidah, Khulna, Bangladesh to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Chitrakar (Muslim traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Chitrakar (Muslim traditions) people know you.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Jhenaidah, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Jhenaidah, Khulna, Bangladesh into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jhenaidah, Khulna, Bangladesh has a population of 1,771,300.

We estimate Jhenaidah has 2,219 people who might know Jesus, 5,314 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,763,767 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Jhenaidah, Khulna, Bangladesh to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

location.name: Jhenaidah
